meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a prince.
meanings.sent1: The royal gown was princelier than any other dress at the ball.
meanings.sent2: The castle's architecture became even princelier with the addition of golden accents.
meanings.sent3: The kitten thought it was princelier than the other cats because it wore a tiny crown.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in princelier hues of purple and gold.
meanings.sent5: The garden looked princelier after the flowers were arranged in a regal pattern.

meanings.definition: More princely in appearance or behavior than something else.
meanings.sent1: The prince's horse was princelier than any other in the royal stable.
meanings.sent2: Her manners were always princelier when she visited the palace.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel acted princelier than the other animals in the forest by wearing a tiny crown made of leaves.
meanings.sent4: The old mansion seemed to grow princelier as the ivy climbed its walls.
meanings.sent5: The music sounded even princelier when played by the royal orchestra.
